evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing solutions.
Private Care Solutions adheres to HIPAA regulations, ensuring data privacy and security.
The integration with Twilio API enhances patient engagement through SMS notifications.
FHIR standards are followed for healthcare data interoperability.
REST APIs are used for real-time data transactions with EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse capabilities found.
